mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS "Count" FROM application T WHERE $WhereClause$

SELECT COUNT(*) AS "Count" FROM view_AuthObject_Account view1, application_scope Scope WHERE view1.AccountId = #accountId# AND View1.AuthorizationObjectId = Scope.AuthorizationObjectId AND View1.AuthorizationObjectType = Scope.AuthorizationObjectType AND Scope.AuthorityId = #AuthorityId# AND Scope.ApplicationId = #ApplicationId#
